title: New: Delaire – Hey You.
content:
Some really slick pop songwriting here from London’s Delaire – think Shura, Jack Garratt and HONNE, and you’re in the right ballpark.

With a host of festival appearances this summer, and more releases expected later in the year – it’s worth getting on board with Delaire now. Check out Hey You. below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
